Name: Angel's Draft
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist and mint leaf.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and discarded.
Garnish with mint leaf floated in the centre of the cocktail.
Review: A refreshing, minty, light cocktail herbal cocktail.
History: Adapted from the Bacardí Legacy 2010 winning cocktail , created in 2009 by Matthew Dakers at The Hoxton Pony in Shoreditch, London, England.
